title: How to Rescue Overcooked Lasagna

steps.headline: Remove the lasagna from the oven.
Pour the liquid of choice over the lasagna in its baking dish.
Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil or a lid.
Return to the oven and bake briefly.
steps.description: Keep baking until all of the liquid is absorbed.

steps.headline: Remove from the oven.
steps.description: The lasagna should be soft and edible.

steps.headline: Prepare for serving.
steps.description: Spruce it up with freshly chopped herbs or an extra sprinkling of freshly grated cheese.

text: Remove the lasagna from the oven.  Pour the liquid of choice over the lasagna in its baking dish.  Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil or a lid.  Return to the oven and bake briefly. Keep baking until all of the liquid is absorbed. Remove from the oven. The lasagna should be soft and edible. Prepare for serving. Spruce it up with freshly chopped herbs or an extra sprinkling of freshly grated cheese.
sentences: Remove the lasagna from the oven.
Pour the liquid of choice over the lasagna in its baking dish.
Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil or a lid.
Return to the oven and bake briefly.
Keep baking until all of the liquid is absorbed.
The lasagna should be soft and edible.
Spruce it up with freshly chopped herbs or an extra sprinkling of freshly grated cheese.
